versions.note:
What's new

  • Platform Administrators can now use “Notifications” feature to publish notification banners and modals to inform all platform users about upcoming maintenance.
  • Platform-wise metrics on the VRE Home Page give an overview of platform users, Projects, data and resources.

Improvements

  • Improved platform automated deployment resulting in shorter maintenance windows.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed bug that caused invited pending users to display on Project Members pages.
  • Fixed bug that caused approved copy tasks to not carry parent folder structure.
  • Fixed bug that caused failure when downloading files and/or folders within a copy request.
  • Fixed bug that caused failure when uploading files from Safari.

What's new

  • Users with Project Collaborator role can now use a “Request to Core” feature to submit requests to have their data copied from their Project Green Room folder to the Core. The requests will be reviewed and approved by a Project Administrator.
  • File Lock mechanism implemented within Project and Dataset file operations to avoid synchronous file operation conflicts.
  • The VRE Command Line interface now supports basic operations on the Charité High Performance Computing cluster (HPC@Charité) including user authentication, job submission, and job status monitoring.

Improvements

  • Adopted the pydantic Basesettings class to manage application settings and configurations.
  • Deployed new backup tasks for more granular database snapshotting.
  • Improved Command Line Interface print out message for large data operations.
  • Updated the default data copy rule for duplicate file/folder name handling.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed bug that caused incorrect file path within file activities advanced search interface.
  • Fixed bug that caused system tag to be missing from file/folders in Green Room.
  • Fixed bug that caused failure when sorting by Create Time in File Explorer.
  • Fixed bug that caused data lineage graph to display wrong deleted file name.

What's new

  • The VRE website was redesigned and rebranded to include additional content, as well as the option for new users to request a VRE Test Account.
  • The Blue Brain Nexus integration was deployed on the VRE to provide users with an interactive Knowledge Graph solution for their Datasets.
  • The VRE Command-Line Tool now supports the import of Dataset annotations into the Knowledge Graph, annotations can now be indexed, linked, and queried for greater Dataset discoverability.

Improvements

  • Optimized the performance of large folder operations, such as folder copy and deletion.
  • Improved the user invitation workflow error handling.
  • Migrated from Helm v2 to Helm v3 for improved security and support of third party dependencies.
  • New backup tasks deployed for more granular database snapshotting.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed bug causing file download to fail for files in the Trash Bin.
  • Fixed bug that caused a duplicated folder to be created during folder import into a Dataset.
  • Fixed bug that caused a duplicated user name folder to be created when removing and re-inviting users to a Project.
  • Fixed bug that affected the annotations of a parent folder of deleted files or folders.

What's new

  • Dataset curation and annotation - users can now annotate their datasets with the default VRE Dataset Schemas, by creating a custom schema, or through upload of the openMINDS Schemas.
  • Dataset Versioning - users can now publish new Dataset versions by designating the release as major or minor and providing version notes.
  • A BIDS Dataset validator is now available for users to validate the structure and integrity of their Datasets in accordance with the BIDS specification.
  • Users can now monitor asynchronous file and folder operations statuses within the Dataset file panel.
  • The VRE command-line tool now supports Dataset listing and downloading, as well as Green Room Data downloading from Green Room zone Workbench VM.

Improvements

  • The VRE command-line interface now supports file download based on Global Entity ID (GEID) and enhanced security measures through session control.
  • Enriched Dataset curation features including file/folder renaming and plain-text file previewer.
  • Upgrades to the file lock mechanism to avoid synchronous file/folder operation conflicts.
  • Optimized MinIO permission control policy to integrate with the VRE IDP Keycloak.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed bug causing an empty folder to appear when a file is moved out of a folder within Datasets.
  • Fixed bug preventing Collaborators from adding Project data uploaded by others into their Datasets.
  • Fixed bug that allowed Dataset Schemas to be submitted without required fields.
  • Fixed bug causing contents of folders to be unavailable after copying to Core.

What's new

  • MinIO (an object storage solution) was deployed as the primary storage backend to support encryption at rest, versioning, and common data operations.
  • VRE Dataset features were implemented to organize research data by Dataset creation, project data import, and provenance tracking within the Dataset.
  • VRE command-line tool now supports PACS data uploading and annotation to the VRE.
  • Project members can now add tags and File Attributes to folders.

Improvements

  • Updated the VRE command-line interface to include support for file download from MinIO.
  • Optimized backend user authorization modelling by rolling out Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) approach.
  • Upgraded the zip contents previewer to support object storage solution.
  • Enriched File Query feature to support querying folders.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed bug causing record duplication when a file is moved to another directory within Datasets.
  • Fixed bug causing Zip contents previewer to display incorrect folder structure.
  • Fixed bug causing Dataset Activity to display incorrect file deletion and import logs.

What's new

  • Enhanced folder operations - users can now create, copy, and delete entire folder trees directly within the File Explorer.
  • Folders can now be added to and removed from personal Collections.
  • Project-based Workbench tools can be configured directly from the Portal by System Administrators.
  • REDCap data integration is now available to Project members, a sample data visualization dashboard for integrated REDCap data is available through Superset.

Improvements

  • Support for folder upload and download via the Command Line Interface.
  • Support for file metadata in the VRE Core Zone.
  • Updated User Support documentation is now available in the VRE Public Wiki.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed bug causing Data Lineage graph to displays incorrect file location and type in VRE Core.
  • Resolved folder duplication bug that was occurring when uploading files directly into a folder.
  • Resolved issue preventing File Previewer from opening for zip files contained within folders.
  • Fixed bug causing File Attributes not to appear for files added to Collections.

What's new

  • User invitation and onboarding workflows were updated to facilitate federation of VRE accounts with the Charite Active Directory.
  • File Query feature was updated to allow Project members to search file metadata.
  • An authentication flow for Project role-based access control to workbench tools was implemented.
  • Users can now upload files and folders into existing folders within the Portal File Explorer.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed bug that was causing the number of files to be displayed incorrectly in the File Statistics card after folder uploading.
  • Fixed bug causing the File Query search button to disappear when a user modified their search criteria.
  • Fixed bug causing missing File Attributes and incorrect process times to be displayed in the Data Lineage Graph.
  • Fixed permission control for Project Collaborator's view access to deleted files originating from the Project Core zone.

Improvements

  • Updated Project folder structure to a simplified UI in the File Explorer.
  • Updated File Query interface to improve File Attributes search capabilities.
  • Refined permission control in VRE XWiki for Project-based content management.
  • Formalized VRE Command Line Tool arguments and options.
  • Updated REDCap data transformation script to include descriptive metadata fields.

What's new

  • Users can now upload data in a folder structure and view folder contents in the File Explorer.
  • Project Service Request feature implemented to support Project-based services access requests and notifications.
  • Development for back-end storage of file metadata to support advanced File Query feature.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed bug causing files to display incorrectly when switching between folders in the File Explorer.

Improvements

  • Updated Portal terminology from File Manifest to File Attribute.
  • Improved display responsivity in tables during Portal window re-sizing.

What's new

  • Major changes to UI/UX styling on Project Canvas and all other Portal pages.
  • Project Announcement feature implemented to support Project-based announcement publishing and notification.
  • Command Line Tool updated to support customized file tag attaching and data lineage creation during uploading.
  • Apache Superset, an external service configured on the Project level, was deployed with Single Sign-On integration.

Bug Fixes

  • Removed flashing error messages occurring during URL loading in Portal Home Page.
  • Fixed bug causing missing Project invitation information in Administrators Console.
  • Fixed UI layout bug occurring in File Explorer when accessing the Portal with Firefox.
  • Improved the stability of large file downloading.

What’s new

  • Data deletion protocol implemented for moving data into zone-specific Trash Bins.
  • A Project File Manifest Template creation and file attachment feature for describing and categorizing data can now be created and configured by Administrators.
  • A File Manifest can be attached by file uploaders or Project Administrator in the Green Room.
  • External open-source services of XWiki and Guacamole were deployed and configured with VRE Portal for documentation management and workbench initiation.
  • Content Previewer feature now allows users to view file structures inside ZIP files within the File Explorer.

Bug Fixes

  • Email notifications now can be sent by Platform Administrators to specific platform users from the Administrators Console.
  • Portal release notes are now available in the Portal page footer.
  • Fixed audit logs bug that was displaying incorrect file activities time.

What’s new

  • Single Sign-On Integration implemented between VRE Portal and workbench clients
  • Manual Data Copy workflow implemented for copying data from Green Room to Core.
  • Personal Collections can now be created by users for grouping and organizing files.

Bug Fixes

  • Attachments can now be added to support requests.
  • Sending a new platform invitation will now cause any previous invitations sent to the same email address to expire.
  • Fixed issue causing white page to appear on manual logout instead of the login page.
  • Fixed 403 errors occurring on page refresh in the Administrators Console.
  • Fixed issue in File Statistics that was causing logs from the previous day to be displayed.
  • Minor fixes to the User Management tab.

What's new

  • Enhanced file tagging & annotation
  • Data lineage graph
  • Search Project attributes
  • Platform Administrators user management console, Search Panel and Properties Side Panel
  • Updated URL to include “/VRE”extension
  • Revised content for clarity and flow.

What’s new

  • Initial Version
  • Updated text and screenshots for clarity;
  • Added Change Log
